summary: Phase 1 testing complete for Taekwondo Competition Manager. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend pages are working correctly. Drag & drop, aire status management, combat tree visualization, and results/podium pages are fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/aires-combat - list aires with status field (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/aires-combat/{aire_id} - change status to 'pause' (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/aires-combat/{aire_id} - change status to 'hs' (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/aires-combat/{aire_id} - change status to 'active' (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/aires-combat/{aire_id} - invalid status handling (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/aires-combat/{aire_id} - non-existent aire returns 404 (PASSED)
Backend: GET /api/combats/ordre/{aire_id} - get ordered combats with enriched data (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/combats/reorder/{aire_id} - reorder combats via drag & drop (PASSED)
Backend: PUT /api/combats/reorder/{aire_id} - non-existent aire returns 404 (PASSED)
Backend: POST /api/combats/{combat_id}/forfait - endpoint exists and validates (PASSED)
Backend: POST /api/combats/{combat_id}/forfait - forfait with valid combat structure (PASSED)
Backend: GET /api/combats/arbre/{categorie_id} - get combat tree structure (PASSED)
Backend: GET /api/medailles - get medals for competition (PASSED)
Backend: Aire status persistence cycle (active->pause->hs->active) (PASSED)
Frontend: Login and competition selection (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - page loads with drag & drop instruction (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Aire selector dropdown (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Active/Pause/HS status buttons (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Status change to Pause with toast notification (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Status change to HS with toast notification (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Status change back to Active (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Combat list with drag handles (GripVertical icons) (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Combat details (Rouge vs Bleu, category, tour) (PASSED)
Frontend: OrdreCombatsPage - Stats display (Total, Terminés, À venir) (PASSED)
Frontend: ArbreCombatPage - page loads with category selector (PASSED)
Frontend: ArbreCombatPage - Combat tree visualization (Demi-finales, Finales) (PASSED)
Frontend: ArbreCombatPage - Rouge/Bleu competitor boxes with clubs (PASSED)
Frontend: ArbreCombatPage - Print button present (PASSED)
Frontend: ResultatsPage - page loads with statistics (PASSED)
Frontend: ResultatsPage - Statistics cards (Catégories terminées, totales, Médailles) (PASSED)
Frontend: ResultatsPage - Collapsible category sections (PASSED)
Frontend: ResultatsPage - Category expand/collapse functionality (PASSED)
Frontend: ResultatsPage - 'En cours' status badge (PASSED)
Frontend: ResultatsPage - Print button present (PASSED)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 features are fully implemented and tested. OrdreCombatsPage uses @dnd-kit for drag & drop (not react-beautiful-dnd). The competition 'Open de Paris 2026' has 4 competitors in 'Juniors Masculin -55kg' category with 4 combats (2 demi-finales, 1 finale, 1 bronze). Aire status changes persist correctly and show visual feedback with toast notifications and badge updates.

backend_apis.PUT /api/combats/reorder/{aire_id}: WORKING - Reorders combats for drag & drop
backend_apis.GET /api/combats/ordre/{aire_id}: WORKING - Returns ordered combats with enriched data
backend_apis.POST /api/combats/{combat_id}/forfait: WORKING - Declares forfait for a competitor
